sentences.en: Arriving home already was crepuscular, parents did not change slipper to enter room.
sentences.cn: 到家已是黄昏, 父母没换拖鞋就进了屋.

sentences.en: Crepuscular , the setting sun lies lackadaisically horizon, incompact give out gentle ray slow.
sentences.cn: 黄昏, 夕阳懒洋洋的卧在天边, 不紧不慢地发出暖和的射线.

sentences.en: Crepuscular now adventure, see have two people vomiting.
sentences.cn: 今日黄昏奇遇, 见有两人呕吐.

trans.tran_cn: 黄昏的，黎明的，昏暗的，模糊的
